message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $10000.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $8000 at this point.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8000 is my absolute minimum, I'd be willing to come up a little to $8500 to make this deal work.  Let's meet in the middle on this!
Alice, I understand you have your minimum price, but I'm still a little higher than that.  How about we split the difference and settle at $8250?  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
